channel.title: Module on kolislab
channel.description: Recent content in Module on kolislab

item.title: Wrapping snap-ins into modules
item.description: Windows PowerShell snap-ins wrapped into modules will give us module auto-loading for the snap-ins.

item.title: Install Modules for both PowerShell editions
item.description: Install a PowerShell module on Windows once and use it with both Windows PowerShell and PowerShell (core)
